pr_title: Setting appropriate defaults for AWS S3 dist config, matching the docs

timeline.message: Setting appropriate defaults for AWS S3 dist config, matching the docs
Setting appropriate defaults for AWS S3 dist config, matching the docs

timeline.body:
We use [BooleanUtils.toBoolean](https://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-lang/apidocs/org/apache/commons/lang3/BooleanUtils.html#toBoolean-java.lang.String-) at a lot of other places. It is much more robust when it comes to casing, …

```suggestion
      pathStyle = BooleanUtils.toBoolean(OsgiUtil.getComponentContextProperty(cc, AWS_S3_PATH_STYLE_CONFIG, "false"));
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
We use BooleanUtils.toBoolean at a lot of other places. It is much more robust when it comes to casing, …

Suggested change
pathStyle = Boolean.valueOf(OsgiUtil.getComponentContextProperty(cc, AWS_S3_PATH_STYLE_CONFIG, "false"));
pathStyle = BooleanUtils.toBoolean(OsgiUtil.getComponentContextProperty(cc, AWS_S3_PATH_STYLE_CONFIG, "false"));
timeline.author: lkiesow
